text: Gaverdovsky () is a khutor in Koshekhablsky District, urban okrug of Maykop, Russia. The population was 3824 as of 2018. There are 65 streets. == Geography == The khutor is located on the right bank of the Belaya River. == Ethnicity == The khutor is inhabited by Circassians, Greeks and Russians. == References == Category:Rural localities in Maykop Federal City
title: Gaverdovsky
